DOC.brief_title: Video Decision Aid Latina Women With Pelvic Organ Prolapse
DOC.detailed_description: Pelvic organ prolapse ( POP ) highly prevalent condition among woman impair quality life , daily activity sexual function . Latina woman disproportionally affect , significantly high rate POP compare woman ethnicity . Counseling Latina woman suffer POP often complex due variety factor , include language barrier , limited patient understand anatomy disease etiology confusion regard surgical versus nonsurgical treatment option . Decision aid use increase patient knowledge prior physician intervention facilitate inform patient participation treatment selection . The investigator hypothesize use video decision aid prior initial Urogynecology specialist evaluation Latina woman POP increase patient knowledge regard condition , decrease decisional conflict regard selection among different treatment option increase patient satisfaction select treatment , empower woman active participant healthcare instead rely provider input alone .
